title: [Alert - Stolen Vehicle]
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 175th St & Jamaica Ave. Police have received a report of a man stealing a silver car. Radio clips available.

title: [Alert - Stolen Vehicle]
updates: Incident reported at 20 Dane Pl. Approved by the Citizen community Citizen user video shows emergency vehicles on the scene of a collision involving two cars.

title: Report of Person Shot
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 65 Tompkins Ave. Police have received a report of a person shot.

title: Report of Man Assaulted on J Train
updates: Incident reported at Broadway & Myrtle Ave. The address reported for this incident has changed to Broadway & Myrtle Ave. Police have received a report of a man being assaulted on the J train.

title: Eight Injured in Basement Fire
updates: Firefighters have received a report of a fire in a first-floor apartment. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 32-79 32nd St. Radio clips available. A Citizen user shows video footage of first responders on the scene. Firefighters have identified the fire's location in the basement of the building and are actively addressing the situation. Firefighters have two lines in operation and are making progress in controlling the basement fire. Radio clips available. Firefighters continue operations in Queens, with three civilians being evaluated for potential injuries. Staging area has been relocated. Firefighters now report seven civilians are being assessed for minor injuries as operations continue. Resources remain on scene. Firefighters report that operations are winding down, with seven civilians being transported for minor injuries. Firefighters report an eighth civilian is being treated for minor injuries as fire operations continue. Fire operations have concluded except for a fire watch. Eight civilians were treated for minor injuries, and EMS units are now available. Radio clips available.

title: Dryer Fire in Basement
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 459 Woodward Ave. Police are responding to a report of a dryer on fire in the basement. Firefighters are on scene using two engines and two trucks to address the basement dryer fire.

title: Report of Person Threatening to Stab Woman
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 19-64 81st St. Police have received a report of a person threatening to stab a woman.

title: Search for Missing 16-Year-Old Named Javed
updates: Incident reported at 72nd St & Astoria Blvd. Police are searching for a missing person named Javed Lopez. The missing is a 16-year-old boy described as 6'0", 130 lbs, last seen wearing black pants and a black sweatshirt on Friday, January 17th.

title: Odor of Gas in Basement Apartment
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 66-43 Pleasantview St. Firefighters have received a report of an odor of gas in a basement apartment.

title: Smoke Condition in Apartment
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 1806 1st Ave. Firefighters have received a report of a smoke condition in an apartment.

title: Person Injured in Vehicle Crash
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 61-19 Fresh Meadow Ln. Police have received a 911 report of a person injured in a vehicle crash. Radio clips available.

title: Smoke From Maintenance Hole
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 516 E 82nd St. Firefighters have received a report of smoke coming from a maintenance hole.

title: Smoke Billowing From Maintenance Hole
updates: Incident reported at 24-56 24th St. Citizen user video shows caution tape around a maintenance hole with heavy smoke pouring out. Use caution in the area.

title: Three Disabled MTA Buses
updates: Incident reported at 153-16 Sanford Ave. A Citizen user shows video of three disabled MTA buses stopped in the middle of a road possibly due to snowy road conditions. Use caution while driving in the area. Police are investigating a new incident involving a gray Jeep and a black Infiniti at a different location.

title: Vehicle Collision
updates: Police are responding to a report of a vehicle collision. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 188th St & 69th Ave.

title: Fire in Apartment at Ravenswood Houses
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 35-20 24th St. Firefighters are on the scene of a fire in an apartment at the Ravenswood Houses. Firefighters are responding to a reported fire at a bar in Queens, following an earlier apartment fire incident. Firefighters have not found any signs of fire in the reported area after a thorough search. Firefighters have confirmed a kitchen fire at the location and are currently addressing the situation. Firefighters have water on the kitchen fire and are actively working to extinguish it. Radio clips available. Firefighters report the kitchen fire is nearly extinguished, with no occupants found. Current response will be maintained.

title: Vehicle Collision
updates: Incident reported at 107-22 67th Ave. Approved by the Citizen community Citizen user @WRauf shows video of a vehicle collision in the area. Please exercise caution nearby. Go LIVE or comment below to share real-time updates from the scene.

title: Smoke Condition in Apartment Building
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 106-35 159th St. Police have received a report of smoke in an apartment building. Firefighters have also been notified.

title: Report of Person Robbed at Gunpoint
updates: A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 83-75 118th St. Police have received a report of a person robbed at gunpoint.

title: Report of Person Shot
updates: Police have received a report of a person who was shot. A 911 caller has reported an unconfirmed incident at 104-56 41st Ave. Radio clips available.
